#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cassert>
#include<bitset>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<deque>
#include<cmath>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include <functional>
#include <bitset>
 
using namespace std;
 
map<long long int,long long int>a;
 
long long int fact(long long int x)
{
   if(x==1)
   return 1;
   if(a[x]!=0)
   return a[x];
   else 
   return a[x]=x*fact(x-1);
}
 
int main()
{
    long long int n,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
       {
        cin>>n;
        cout<<fact(n)<<endl;
       }
    
    return 0;
}
